column4: 4:30 pm to 7:30 pm - 3 lanes inbound, 1 lane outbound.
10 pm to 1 am - 3 lanes outbound, 1 lane inbound.
Alumni Dr from the stadium to Tates Creek and to Nicholasville Rd.
Cooper Dr from the stadium to Tates Creek.

column3: Tates Creek Rd at Alumni Dr:
column4: Outbound traffic on Tates Creek Rd must turn left onto Alumni Dr.
